detectors.description:

detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract AEther (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AEther.sol#102-224) has payable functions:
	 - AEther.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AEther.sol#212-214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0

detectors.description:
AEther.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AEther.sol#146-151) can write the state variable array at will

	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AEther.sol#148)

detectors.description:
